ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def OnViewExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNLancamentoCodigoInterno from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Comercial import CMItem
documento = entity.Fields["LANCAMENTOITEMFAT"]
command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciFATRAT command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["ENTIDADEORIGEM"] = CMItem.Get(documento) command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = True
